content: How can I install a missing tool in rustup without manually searching through nightlies? I use nightly rustfmt for a project and I want to check it in CI, but rustup toolchain install nightly && rustup +nightly component add rustfmt doesn't work when rustfmt missed a nightly because of broken toolstate. How can I solve this?

This fixed it:

rustup toolchain install nightly --component rustfmt

Hope that's useful to someone else!
